TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripComboBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示正确呈现在 中的 。

span.span: Represents a that is properly rendered in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是适合用来托管在。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 在公开的托管的控件的属性和事件子集级别，但基础控件是完全可通过访问属性。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. 一个显示与结合使用的编辑字段，允许用户从列表中选择或输入新文本。A displays an editing field combined with a , allowing the user to select from the list or to enter new text. 默认情况下，显示隐藏的下拉列表的编辑字段。By default, a displays an edit field with a hidden drop-down list. 属性确定用于显示组合框的样式。The property determines the style of combo box to display. 可以输入一个值，使简单的下拉列表，这始终显示列表、 下拉列表框中，其中的文本部分不可编辑，并且你必须选择一个箭头，查看下拉列表框中，或默认值下拉列表框中，其中的文本部分是 editable，并且用户必须按箭头键可以查看的列表。You can enter a value that allows for a simple drop-down, where the list always displays, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down list box, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list. 若要始终显示用户无法编辑的列表，请使用控件。To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a control. 若要在运行时将对象添加到列表，将分配与对象引用的数组方法。To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the method. 然后，列表显示每个对象的默认字符串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 您可以添加具有单个对象方法。You can add individual objects with the method. 显示和选择功能，除了还提供了多种功能，可有效地将项添加到和查找在列表的项中的文本。In addition to display and selection functionality, the also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the and to find text within the items of the list. 并方法，可以添加大量项到而无需每次都重新绘制控件项添加到列表。The and methods enable you to add a large number of items to the without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list. 和方法，您可以搜索包含特定的搜索字符串的列表中的项。The and methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string. 使用属性以获取或设置当前项在下拉列表中，并使用属性来获取或设置下拉列表中的当前项的引用。Use the property to get or set the current item in the drop-down list, and use the property to get or set a reference to the current item in the drop-down list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了使用不同的属性设置，包括自动完成。The following code example demonstrates a with various property settings, including automatic completion. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当 属性设置为 时使用的自定义字符串集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom string collection to use when the property is set to .
An that contains the strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，并属性，以创建的自动完成输入的字符串进行比较所输入的前缀中维护源的所有字符串的前缀。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这可用于控件中的 Url、 地址、 文件的名称或命令将经常输入。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 利用属性是可选的但必须设置属性设置为若要使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to in order to use . 必须使用和属性组合在一起。You must use the and properties together. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置各种语法属性，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various properties, including the property. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginUpdate() cil managed

summary.span: 将各项逐一添加到 时维持性能。

span.span: Maintains performance when items are added to the one at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法阻止直到绘制用户控件调用方法。This method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 若要将项添加到的首选的方式是使用方法通过属性的。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method through the property of the . 这使您一次向列表添加项的数组。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用的其中一个方法中，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件每次向列表添加项。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成将项添加到列表的任务后，调用方法，以使重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 将项添加的这种方式可以防止在绘制过程闪烁大量的项添加到列表时。This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 为了维护更好的性能，不应设置的其构造函数中。In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the of a in its constructor. 首选的方法是重写属性。The preferred method is to override the property.

span.para: 重写时派生类中的属性，它是更可取的方法返回对象所需的维度，而不是重写所有实现。
When overriding the property in a derived class, it is preferable to return a object with the desired dimensions rather than overriding all the implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripComboBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripComboBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制向用户显示的接口。The property controls the interface that is presented to the user. 你可以输入一个值，使简单的下拉列表框中，其中该列表始终显示，下拉列表框中，不能编辑文本部分，您必须选择一个箭头，查看下拉列表或默认值下拉列表框中，其中的文本部分是 editable，并且用户必须按箭头键可以查看的列表。You can enter a value that allows for a simple drop-down list box, where the list always displays, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list. 若要始终显示用户无法编辑的列表，请使用控件。To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置各种语法属性，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将项添加到的首选的方式是使用方法通过属性的。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method through the property of the . 这使您一次向列表添加项的数组。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用的其中一个方法中，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件每次向列表添加项。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成将项添加到列表的任务后，调用方法，以使重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 将项添加的这种方式可以防止在绘制过程闪烁大量的项添加到列表时。This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list.

returns.span: 找到的第一个项的从零开始的索引；如果未找到匹配项，则返回 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`参数是子字符串进行比较与组合框列表中的项关联的文本。The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜索执行部分匹配的文本，从头开始启动并匹配指定的子字符串的列表中返回的第一项。The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然后可以执行任务，例如删除包含该搜索文本的项或更改项的文本。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text or changing the item's text. 找到指定的文本，如果你想要搜索的文本中的其他实例后，使用方法，以指定的起始索引内。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , use method to specify a starting index within the . 如果你想要执行搜索而不是部分匹配确切的单词匹配，则使用方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取或设置的显示样式。Use the property to get or set the display style of the . 从.NET Framework 4.5.2 开始，如果属性设置为或，可以调整大小的下拉箭头。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the property is set to or , the drop-down arrow may be resized. 重设大小取决于系统 DPI 设置时的 app.config 文件包含以下条目：Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置各种语法属性，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，该控件自动调整大小以确保不全部显示项。When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed. 如果想要保留的原始大小根据你的窗体的空间要求，将此属性设置为`false`。If you want to maintain the original size of the based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`. 如果不包含任何项，此属性不起作用。If the does not contain any items, this property has no effect. 设置属性重置属性设置为`false`。Setting the property resets the property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDropDown(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDropDown (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnDropDown : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnDropDown : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当用户更改组合框选择时引发。 is raised only when the user changes the combo box selection. 不要使用或来捕获用户更改，因为所选内容以编程方式更改时，也会引发这些事件。Do not use or to capture user changes, because those events are also raised when the selection changes programmatically. 在设置时，也会引发此事件。This event is also raised when you set . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.span: Gets or sets the index specifying the currently selected item.

value.span: 当前选定项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.

value.span: 如果未选定任何项，则返回值为负一 (-1)。

span.span: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示组合框列表中的当前选定项的从零开始的索引。This property indicates the zero-based index of the currently selected item in the combo box list. 设置新的索引将引发事件。Setting a new index raises the event. **请注意**若要取消选择当前所选的项，设置为-1。**Note** To deselect the currently selected item, set the to -1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedIndexChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在 属性的值更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripComboBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripComboBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#581](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#581)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#581](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#581)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ SelectedItem { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.SelectedItem : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 中当前选定的项。

span.span: Gets or sets currently selected item in the .

value.span: 作为当前选定项的对象，如果当前没有选定项，则为 。

span.span: The object that is the currently selected item or if there is no currently selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将设置属性设置为一个对象，尝试使该对象列表中当前所选的一个。When you set the property to an object, the attempts to make that object the currently selected one in the list. 如果在列表中找到该对象，它将显示在的编辑部分和属性设置为相应的索引。If the object is found in the list, it is displayed in the edit portion of the and the property is set to the corresponding index. 如果该对象不在列表中，存在属性保留为其当前值。If the object does not exist in the list, the property is left at its current value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectedText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SelectedText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的可编辑部分中选定的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is selected in the editable portion of a .

value.span: 表示组合框中当前选定文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the currently selected text in the combo box.

value.span: 如果 设置为 ，则返回值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: If is set to , the return value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将文本分配给此属性来更改组合框中当前选定的文本。You can assign text to this property to change the text currently selected in the combo box. 如果在组合框中当前未不选定任何文本，此属性将返回一个零长度字符串。If no text is currently selected in the combo box, this property returns a zero-length string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的可编辑部分中选定字符的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the editable portion of the .
The number of characters selected in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性以确定是否任何字符当前在所选文本执行操作前选择组合框控件中。You can use this property to determine whether any characters are currently selected in the combo box control before performing operations on the selected text. 时的值属性设置为大于控件的值的文本内的字符数的值为属性设置为的值减去控件中的文本的整个长度属性 (如果为指定任何值属性)。When the value of the property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the property (if any value is specified for the property).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionStart { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionStart : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 中选定文本的起始索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting index of text selected in the .

value.span: 当前选中文本的字符串中第一个字符的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first character in the string of the current text selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件中不选择任何文本，则此属性指示新的文本的插入点。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text. 如果将此属性设置控件中的文本的长度之外的位置，选择开始位置位于最后一个字符后。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position is placed after the last character. 文本框控件中选定文本后，更改此属性可以释放的值属性。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property can release the value of the property. 如果所指示的位置之后控件中的剩余文本属性小于的值属性、 的值属性会自动减小。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 值属性将永远不会导致在增加属性。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Sorted { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Sorted : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 中的项是否已排序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the are sorted.

value.span: 如果对组合框进行了排序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定是否对现有条目进行排序并将新条目添加到列表中的适当排序位置。This property specifies whether the sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list. 可以使用此属性进行自动排序中的项。You can use this property to automatically sort items in a . 将项目添加到一个经过排序，项目移动到已排序的列表中的相应位置。As items are added to a sorted , the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list. 将属性设置为`false`，新项添加到现有列表的末尾。When you set the property to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list. 排序是区分大小写且按字母顺序升序排序。The sort is case-insensitive and in alphabetically ascending order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置各种语法属性，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various properties, including the property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]
